00021 static dfsch_object_t* random_state;
00022 
00023 typedef struct random_init_t {
00024   uint8_t uninitialized[16];
00025   time_t time;
00026   struct tms tms;
00027   clock_t clock;
00028   struct rusage rusage;
00029   uint8_t sys_random[16];
00030 } random_init_t;
00031 
00032 static dfsch_object_t* make_default_state(){
00033   random_init_t seed;
00034   int fd;
00035   seed.time = time(NULL);
00036   seed.clock = times(&seed.tms);
00037   getrusage(RUSAGE_SELF, &seed.rusage);
00038   
00039   fd = open("/dev/urandom", O_RDONLY | O_NONBLOCK);
00040   if (fd < 0) {
00041     fd = open("/dev/random", O_RDONLY | O_NONBLOCK);
00042   }
00043   if (fd >= 0){
00044     read(fd, &seed.sys_random, 16);
00045     close(fd);
00046   }
00047 
00048   return dfsch_make_default_random_state(&seed, sizeof(random_init_t));
00049 }
00050 
00051 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_get_random_state(){
00052   if (!random_state){
00053     random_state = make_default_state();
00054   }
00055   return random_state;
00056 }
00057 void dfsch_set_random_state(dfsch_object_t* state){
00058   random_state = state;
00059 }
00060 
00061 void dfsch_random_get_bytes(dfsch_object_t* state, uint8_t* buf, size_t len){
00062   if (!state){
00063     state = dfsch_get_random_state();
00064   }
00065   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(state)->type != DFSCH_RANDOM_STATE_TYPE_TYPE){
00066     dfsch_error("Not a random state", state);
00067   }
00068   ((dfsch_random_state_type_t*)(DFSCH_TYPE_OF(state)))->get_bytes(state, buf, len);
00069 }
00070 int dfsch_random_get_integer(dfsch_object_t* state, int max){
00071   int bits;
00072   int val;
00073   do {
00074     dfsch_random_get_bytes(state, &bits, sizeof(unsigned int));
00075     if (bits < 0){
00076       bits = -bits;
00077     }
00078     val = bits % max;
00079   } while (bits - val - (max+1) < 0);
00080   return val;
00081 }
00082 double dfsch_random_get_double(dfsch_object_t* state){
00083   uint64_t val;
00084   dfsch_random_get_bytes(state, &val, sizeof(uint64_t));
00085   val &= (1LL << 53) - 1;
00086   return (double)val/(double)(1LL << 53);
00087 }
00088 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_random_get_number(dfsch_object_t* state, 
00089                                         dfsch_object_t* max){
00090   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(max) == DFSCH_FIXNUM_TYPE){
00091     return DFSCH_MAKE_FIXNUM(dfsch_random_get_integer(state, 
00092                                                       DFSCH_FIXNUM_REF(max)));
00093   }
00094   return 
00095     dfsch_number_mul(dfsch_make_number_from_double(dfsch_random_get_double(state)),
00096                      max);
00097 }
00098 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_random_get_bignum(dfsch_object_t* state,
00099                                         size_t len){
00100   uint8_t *buf;
00101   if ((len % 8) != 0){
00102     buf = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(len / 8 + 1);
00103     dfsch_random_get_bytes(state, buf, len / 8 + 1);
00104     *buf &= (1 << (len & 7)) - 1;
00105     return dfsch_bignum_to_number(dfsch_bignum_from_bytes(buf, len / 8 + 1));
00106   } else {
00107     buf = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(len / 8);
00108     dfsch_random_get_bytes(state, buf, len / 8);
00109     return dfsch_bignum_to_number(dfsch_bignum_from_bytes(buf, len / 8));
00110   }
00111 }

00113 typedef struct default_state_t {
00114   dfsch_type_t* type;
00115   int counter;
00116   uint32_t sum;
00117   uint32_t state[8][2];
00118   uint32_t skeys[4];
00119   uint32_t okeys[8];
00120 } default_state_t;
00121 
00122 static void default_get_bytes(default_state_t* state, uint8_t* buf, size_t len){
00123   uint32_t v = state->sum;
00124   uint32_t u = state->counter;
00125   int i;
00126   state->counter++;
00127   for (i = 0; i < 8; i++){
00128     v += (((u << 4) ^ (u >> 5)) + u) ^ 
00129       (state->sum + state->skeys[state->sum & 3]);
00130     state->sum += 0x9e3779b9;
00131     u += (((u << 4) ^ (u >> 5)) + u) ^ 
00132       (state->sum + state->state[i][0]);
00133     v += (((u << 4) ^ (u >> 5)) + u) ^ 
00134       (state->sum + state->state[i][1]);
00135     state->sum += 0x9e3779b9;
00136     u += (((u << 4) ^ (u >> 5)) + u) ^ 
00137       (state->sum + state->skeys[(state->sum >> 11) & 3]);
00138     state->okeys[(state->counter + 1) & 7] ^= v ^ u;
00139   }
00140   state->state[state->counter & 7][0] = u;
00141   state->state[state->counter & 7][1] = v;
00142 
00143   while (len){
00144     for (i = 0; i < 4; i++){
00145       v += (((u << 4) ^ (u >> 5)) + u) ^ 
00146         (state->sum + state->okeys[state->sum & 7]);
00147       state->sum += 0x9e3779b9;
00148       u += (((u << 4) ^ (u >> 5)) + u) ^ 
00149         (state->sum + state->okeys[(state->sum >> 11) & 7]);
00150     }
00151     *buf = u;
00152     buf++;
00153     len--;
00154     u >>= 8;
00155     v >>= 8;
00156     u += state->sum;
00157     v += state->counter;
00158   }
00159 }

00161 dfsch_random_state_type_t dfsch_default_random_state_type = {
00162   {
00163     DFSCH_RANDOM_STATE_TYPE_TYPE,
00164     DFSCH_RANDOM_STATE_TYPE,
00165     sizeof(default_state_t),
00166     "default-random-state",
00167     NULL,
00168     NULL,
00169     NULL,
00170     NULL
00171   },
00172   (dfsch_random_get_bytes_t)default_get_bytes,
00173   0
00174 };
00175 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_make_default_random_state(uint8_t* seed, size_t len){
00176   default_state_t* state = dfsch_make_object(DFSCH_DEFAULT_RANDOM_STATE_TYPE);
00177   uint32_t u = 0x01234567;
00178   uint32_t v = 0x89abcdef;
00179   int i, j;
00180   
00181   state->counter = 0;
00182   state->sum = 0;
00183 
00184   for (j = 0; j < 8; j++){
00185     for (i = 0; i < 8; i++){
00186       v += (((u << 4) ^ (u >> 5)) + u) ^ 
00187         (state->sum + (seed[state->sum % len] | 
00188                        (seed[(state->sum + 1) % len] << 8) |
00189                        (seed[(state->sum + 2) % len] << 16) |
00190                        (seed[(state->sum + 3) % len] << 24)));
00191       state->sum += 0x9e3779b9;
00192       u += (((u << 4) ^ (u >> 5)) + u) ^ 
00193         (state->sum + (seed[(state->sum >> 11) % len] |
00194                        (seed[((state->sum >> 11) + 1) % len] << 8) |
00195                        (seed[((state->sum >> 11) + 2) % len] << 16) |
00196                        (seed[((state->sum >> 11) + 3) % len] << 24)));
00197     }
00198     state->state[j][0] = u;
00199     state->state[j][1] = v;
00200   }
00201 
00202   for (j = 0; j < 2; j++){
00203     for (i = 0; i < 8; i++){
00204       v += (((u << 4) ^ (u >> 5)) + u) ^ 
00205         (state->sum + (seed[state->sum % len] | 
00206                        (seed[(state->sum + 1) % len] << 8) |
00207                        (seed[(state->sum + 2) % len] << 16) |
00208                        (seed[(state->sum + 3) % len] << 24)));
00209       state->sum += 0x9e3779b9;
00210       u += (((u << 4) ^ (u >> 5)) + u) ^ 
00211         (state->sum + (seed[(state->sum >> 11) % len] |
00212                        (seed[((state->sum >> 11) + 1) % len] << 8) |
00213                        (seed[((state->sum >> 11) + 2) % len] << 16) |
00214                        (seed[((state->sum >> 11) + 3) % len] << 24)));
00215     }
00216     state->skeys[j + 0] = u;
00217     state->skeys[j + 1] = v;
00218   }
00219 
00220   for (j = 0; j < 2; j++){
00221     for (i = 0; i < 8; i++){
00222       v += (((u << 4) ^ (u >> 5)) + u) ^ 
00223         (state->sum + (seed[state->sum % len] | 
00224                        (seed[(state->sum + 1) % len] << 8) |
00225                        (seed[(state->sum + 2) % len] << 16) |
00226                        (seed[(state->sum + 3) % len] << 24)));
00227       state->sum += 0x9e3779b9;
00228       u += (((u << 4) ^ (u >> 5)) + u) ^ 
00229         (state->sum + (seed[(state->sum >> 11) % len] |
00230                        (seed[((state->sum >> 11) + 1) % len] << 8) |
00231                        (seed[((state->sum >> 11) + 2) % len] << 16) |
00232                        (seed[((state->sum >> 11) + 3) % len] << 24)));
00233     }
00234     state->okeys[j + 0] = u;
00235     state->okeys[j + 1] = v;
00236   }
00237   
00238   return (dfsch_object_t*) state;
00239 }
00240 typedef struct file_state_t {
00241   dfsch_type_t* type;
00242   int fd;
00243 } file_state_t;
00244 
00245 static void file_get_bytes(file_state_t* state, uint8_t* buf, size_t len){
00246   ssize_t r;
00247   while (len){
00248     r = read(state->fd, buf, len);
00249     if (r < 0){
00250       if (errno != EAGAIN){
00251         dfsch_error("Error reading random source", state);
00252       }
00253     }
00254     len -= r;
00255   }
00256 }

00258 dfsch_random_state_type_t dfsch_file_random_state_type = {
00259   {
00260     DFSCH_RANDOM_STATE_TYPE_TYPE,
00261     DFSCH_RANDOM_STATE_TYPE,
00262     sizeof(file_state_t),
00263     "file-random-state",
00264     NULL,
00265     NULL,
00266     NULL,
00267     NULL
00268   },
00269   (dfsch_random_get_bytes_t)file_get_bytes,
00270   0
00271 };
00272 static void file_state_finalizer(file_state_t* state){
00273   if (state->fd >= 0){
00274     close(state->fd);
00275     state->fd = -1;
00276   }
00277 }
00278 
00279 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_make_file_random_state(char* filename){
00280   file_state_t* state = dfsch_make_object(DFSCH_FILE_RANDOM_STATE_TYPE);
00281 
00282   state->fd = open(filename, O_RDONLY);
00283   if (state->fd < 0){
00284     dfsch_error("Cannot open file", dfsch_make_string_cstr(filename));
00285   }
00286 
00287   GC_REGISTER_FINALIZER(state, (GC_finalization_proc)file_state_finalizer,
00288                         NULL, NULL, NULL);
00289 
00290   return state;
00291 }

00293 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(random_bytes, 0){
00294   size_t len;
00295   uint8_t *buf;
00296   dfsch_object_t* state;
00297   DFSCH_LONG_ARG(args, len);
00298   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG_OPT(args, state, NULL);
00299   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00300   buf = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(len);
00301   dfsch_random_get_bytes(state, buf, len);
00302 
00303   return dfsch_make_string_buf(buf, len);
00304 }

00344 void dfsch__random_register(dfsch_object_t *ctx){ 
00345   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "<random-state>", DFSCH_RANDOM_STATE_TYPE);
00346   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "<default-random-state>", 
00347                     DFSCH_DEFAULT_RANDOM_STATE_TYPE);
00348   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "<file-random-state>", DFSCH_FILE_RANDOM_STATE_TYPE);
00349 
00350   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "random-bytes", DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(random_bytes));
00351   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "random-flonum", DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(random_flonum));
00352   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "random-bignum", DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(random_bignum));
00353   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "random", DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(random));
00354 
00355   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "make-default-random-state", 
00356                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(make_default_random_state));
00357   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "make-file-random-state", 
00358                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(make_file_random_state));
00359 }
